title: You should play Undertale.
body:
Because very few other games have remixes like this.

Cringe warning if you actually watch the video.  Do your gamer pride a favor and alt-tab.  But do listen.  :P

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IMNLy67ihY4

Play it blind.  Play it like you USED to play games.  Stop thinking about it and try it.  
Give it 3 minutes and ask yourself "Is it good enough to keep playing"?  That's all you need to do.

It got hyped AFTER its release, if that tells you anything.  Not before, like Destiny, or Titanfall, or a hundred others.

Demo's here.

http://www.undertale.com
